description: Try our easy to follow Pumpkin, Zucchini & Sage Macaroni recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Discovery Garden,Zucchini,Halal,Microwave,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Pumpkin, Zucchini & Sage Macaroni Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs sage leaves (plus extra fried sage leaves to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Grease an 8-cup baking dish. Cook macaroni in boiling salted water for 8 minutes. Drain.
Meanwhile, microwave zucchini spaghetti according to packet instructions.

Heat soup in a large frying pan over high heat. Add macaroni, 3/4 cup parmesan and sage to soup. Reserve some of the zucchini for serving and stir remainder through macaroni mixture. Transfer to a baking dish. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden. Serve topped with reserved zucchini, extra sage leaves and remaining parmesan.
